title: 369: Remembering Your Soul’s Purpose with Sahara Rose
itunes:title: 369: Remembering Your Soul’s Purpose with Sahara Rose
description:
We dive deep into the realms on all things dharma, soul purpose and past lives in this rich and juicy episode. I was interviewed by my friend Ben Harris and just loved the conversation and wanted to share it with my Highest Self Podcast community. We speak about what it really means to live in your dharma, the balance between our responsibility to support the world and enjoy it, how my past lives have affected my work and so much more. You’ll feel like the third person in the room in this incredible conversation.

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Get your copy of Discover Your Dharma + receive free bonuses including my meditation, embodiment practice and tapping at iamsahararose.com/dharma

Discover your soul’s purpose in just 21 days with my 21 Day Dharma Discovery Journey: iamsahararose.com/dharmadiscovery

Join Rose Gold Goddesses + transform your life from the inside out today at rosegoldgoddesses.com

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at:
Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose
Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: www.iamsahararose.com/books
